stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing an agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses an agenda, add this asset to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
text:
While the Runner is accessing an agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses an agenda, add this asset to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
title: Franchise City
